description: Triangle A(n,m) of numbers of n-element T_0-antichains on a labeled m-set, m=0,...,2^n.
comments: An antichain on a set is a T_0-antichain if for every two distinct points of the set there exists a member of the antichain containing one but not the other point. Row sums give A059079. Column sums give A059083.
references: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6)
V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On enumeration of the class of all monotone Boolean functions, in preparation.
links: V. Jovovic, 3-element T_0-antichains on a labeled 4-set
V. Jovovic, Formula for the number of m-element T_0-antichains on a labeled n-set
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Dec 29 2000
